job.title: Software Engineer (NYC or US Remote)
job.description: Roofstock is the leading marketplace for investing in singlefamily rental homes Our mission is to make real estate investing radically accessible cost effective and simple We want to use technology to transform the way real estate is bought and sold and make real estate investing as simple as investing in stocks Simply put we are passionate about helping our customers build wealth through real estatebrbrRoofstock has been recognized as a Great Place to Work and was recently named to the Forbes Fintech 50 and the Red Herring 100 lists of most innovative companies Roofstock has raised over 135M to date is based in Oakland California and DallasTexas with approximately 180 people and is growing rapidly Check out our reviews and see why our employees love working herebrbrWeve built an amazing culture where everyone has a voice Were nice We get things done We have fun We believe in worklife balance yes you can really take a vacation And our values are pretty BADASSbrbrstrongBstronge customer obsessedbrbrstrongAstrongct like an owner because you are onebrbrstrongDstrongont be afraid to break things in the pursuit of betterbrbrstrongAstrongll of us are empowered to do the right thingbrbrstrongSstrongtay curious and create whats next FastbrbrstrongSstrongeriously No jerksbrbrAt Great Jones were out to build the leading fullservice operating platform for lowerscale residential rental real estate tens of millions of singlefamily homes and apartment buildings without onsite management collectively worth trillions of dollars but underpenetrated by technology to datebrbrBy combining technology and design with bestinclass operations amp growth leadership we will unlock the asset class from previous constraints posted by operational headachesbrbrTechnology penetration is low here vs other asset classes which just means we have lots of greenfield technology to buildbrbrAs a Software Engineer here you will roll up your sleeves work closely with our product amp engineering teams and help build the foundation of various software components Because we are so greenfield and nothing quite like this has ever been built before your team will be working with the latest and greatest technologies including AWSmanaged services serverless components GraphQL and NLPbrbrYoull help build things like a MintRobinhood style app so owners can see and manage their rental properties in realtime from wherever they are with the power of realtime data smart home automation and predictive analytics at their fingertips an Uberstyle interface so residents can request maintenance rate their service experiences pay their rent or perform any other interaction or communication and optimized systemized workflows for everything from leasing to leaky faucets to property optimizationbrbrYour teams work  delivering software that delights our customers and their tenants automates and instruments a traditionally lowtech industry and enables controlled and elegant scaling of the business  will be an absolutely crucial part of that journeybrbrstronguWhat You Will DobrustrongulliWork with a Lead Software Engineer and peer engineers to develop new and existing full stack software systems to the highest technical quality and accountability standardsliliCollaborate with a crossfunctional team of designers product managers and analysts to develop highquality technical solutions to customer and business problemsliliEngage in code reviews and help to define and maintain high standards of code qualityliliCollaborate with other Technology team members and leaders to refine best practices and processesliliStay current on leading edge technology to help the organization stay at the forefront of industry innovationbrliulstronguWhat You Will BringbrustrongulliEquipped with 1 years of professional programming experience time at a rapidly growing technology organization is a plusliliProficient in at least one programming language Python Go Nodejs  Ruby or something similarliliBacked by a strong understanding of software engineering principles and fundamentals like data structures and algorithmsliliEnjoy building new products from scratch not just improving existing ones Youve thrived in similar situations in the pastliliSuccessful in an agile work environment breaking down large pieces of work to deliver value incrementallyliliProduct sensibility you have worked closely with product management and design and consider yourself a usercentric thinkerliliKnowledgeable about modern relational databases such as PostgreSQL Oracle or MySQLliliExperience with AWS is a plusbrliulstrongFor our regular fulltime roles we offer a great benefits packagebrbrstrongCompetitive compensationbrbrMedical Vision and Dental for you 95 and your dependents 65brbr401kbrbrFlexible time off and sick daysbrbrSupplemental bonus to support work from home office needsbrbrEquity incentives to give you a stake in the Companys futurebrbrWe are an upbeat and collaborative work culturebrbrVirtual companysponsored outingsbrbremRoofstock is an equal opportunity employer In keeping with the values of Roofstock we make all employment decisions including hiring evaluation termination promotional and training opportunities without regard to race religion color sex age national origin ancestry sexual orientation physical handicap mental disability medical condition disability gender or identity or expression pregnancy or pregnancyrelated condition marital status height andor
